typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['test.txt'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
